sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The gnome-media package contains gnome-sound-recorder, gnome-cd, gnome-volume-control and vumeter.

sect3.title: gnome-volume-control
sect3.para: gnome-volume-control is Gnome's mixer with volume applet.

sect3.title: vumeter
sect3.para: vumeter is a visual volume meter.
